name: FBO - Backup Manager for DB2 databases
labels: Backup tool to manage DB2 database backup
short_description:
web application to manage and schedule backup tasks for DB2 on Linux and AIX.

select backup type (full, inc, delta) for each db for each day separately.

backup target is TSM

Implement "Daily - Monthly - Yearly" backup concept without any Image reorganization.

Logging is included to monitor backup progress and success.

The backup tasks will be started for each instance once a day. Every database, which resides in the instance, will be controlled. It is your decision, what backup type (full, inc, delta, no backup) for each database will be used.

The Backup Manager Tool consists of 3 parts:

Web Application, running with Windows® IIS Server 
Windows service for starting the backup tasks. 
Microsoft® SQL Server® database, the Repository for the Backup Manager Tool
 
All Components can be installed on a single server, as well as on dedicated servers. Please look at the documentation for further information, installation and administration.
summary: web application to manage and schedule backup tasks for DB2 databases
